title: Find out the interpretation of a dream about someone telling me that Ibn Sirin is infatuated with me

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing someone telling me that I am bewitched in a dream. Seeing magic is one of the terrifying visions that shake the conscience and terrify the soul. This vision carries many negative connotations according to psychology and is hated by jurisprudence and interpretive scholars, and when you see someone telling you that they are bewitched. This has many symbols, and the vision could be a message or a warning that you should be careful. What concerns us in this article is that we are looking at all the special cases and connotations of the dream in which someone tells me that I am fascinated. Discover the interpretation of a dream about someone telling me that Ibn Sirin is fascinated with the interpretation of a dream in which someone tells me that I am fascinated. Fascinated: Seeing magic expresses distress, pain, intense experience, and temptation spreading like lightning, the spread of tyranny and falsehood, the abundance of corrupt people, and the promotion of heresies and esoteric doctrines. But when I see someone telling me in a dream that I am fascinated, this is a warning of the emergence of many problems and misfortunes in the coming period and going through serious crises that drain the person’s energy and vitality. This vision also indicates that negative charges are running inside a person, spoiling his future plans and projects and leading him to bad curves that force him to follow paths different from what was planned. And if he sees someone telling him that he is bewitched, this indicates turmoil and falling into him, and the many conspiracies and worldly temptations that come with him. He indulged in it and distracted him from his main goals. From a psychological point of view, this vision expresses love, tenderness, and the tyranny of emotions over a person, making their decisions and judgments stem from their turbulent emotions. The enchanted is the one who fell into the well of temptation and passion, and plunged into the depths without being able to get out. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing magic means vanity and pride, violating the normal instinct, inclination toward falsehood and companionship with people, and turning away from the truth and staying away from people. Whoever sees someone telling him that he is bewitched, then he has been affected by the fire of rage and has allowed himself to control it and move it as he wants, and to listen to the spirit and the desires it dictates to its owner. Forcing him to please her by any means without complying with Sharia and binding law. The vision may be an indication of polytheism in God, adopting a wrong path, and many deviant thoughts that corrupt a person’s mind, caress his heart, and fall under the weight of an innovator who spreads doubt in himself and calls him to commit sins and transgressions without remorse. Or regret. Repentance. And whoever sees someone telling him that he is bewitched, and at the same time he sees the jinn, this indicates disorder, malice, and gross deception. And if the dreamer is actually bewitched in the dream, then this expresses the touch of an evil spirit, the appearance of the abomination and evil that befalls him, and the presence of someone who harms him and bewitches him with malicious words. He lies about it. What is meant is: If a person sees that he is a magician and not bewitched, then this indicates his disappointment and striving, his inability to achieve what he aspires to, and the passage of a period in which he witnesses a sharp deterioration in everything he desires. . And deprivation of blessings and good things and lack of success, and this is due to the words of God Almighty: “But they are weak

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a husband wearing new clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing the husband in new clothes in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of the dream of seeing the husband in new clothes in a dream, and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of. On the site, they do not make interpretations, but from the heart, some scholars interpret the dream of seeing the husband in new clothes in a dream. If you see the husband wearing new clothes in a dream, this may indicate the good things that will come to the husband during this time, thanks to God. The dream of the husband wearing new clothes may indicate a large amount of livelihood that the wife will obtain during this period, and God knows best. If you see the wife wearing new clothes in a dream, this may indicate the halal diet that the dreamer is looking for in those days, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the husband wearing new clothes in a dream indicates positive transformations that occur in their lives during those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband eating cooked meat in a dream The dream of eating cooked meat for the husband in a dream may indicate the wide diet that the husband can obtain in those days. If you dream that your husband is eating cooked meat, this may indicate positive changes that occur in his life during this period. If you see yourself eating cooked meat in a dream, this may indicate the halal money that the husband may earn during this period. If you see the husband eating cooked meat in a dream, this may indicate the solution to a major problem that the dreamer was in And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband entering a mosque in a dream A dream about a husband entering a mosque in a dream can indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams. It is possible that the husband will see entering the mosque at the height of the kinship that may bind him to him during this period, and God knows best. In the event that the husband dreams of entering the mosque, this may indicate the profits that the husband may gain and the abundant money. If you see the husband entering the mosque in a dream, this may indicate the satisfaction of desires and dreams to a large extent during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about kissing the hand of the husband's mother in a dream Kissing your mother-in-law's hand in a dream may indicate the health and well-being that she enjoyed during that period. If a woman sees herself kissing her mother-in-law's hand, this may indicate the good things that will come her way in those days. It is possible that seeing the wife's mother being kissed in a dream indicates her good tidings in those days, and God knows best. Seeing a woman kissing in a dream may indicate the happiness and family stability that they enjoyed at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a woman hitting her husband in a dream If a woman sees herself hitting her husband in a dream, this may indicate the payment of debts and financial crises to a large extent During this period. The dream that shows the husband hitting his wife in a dream may indicate that he benefits a lot from her advice, and God knows best. Seeing the husband hitting his wife in a dream may be a sign of the joke and good relationship that existed between them at that time, and God knows best. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his daughter according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his daughter has many meanings and interpretations that differed depending on the person of the beholder, his circumstances, and the events around him, which prompted us to present what was said about this dream by interpretation scholars to resolve the questions that were raised of this kind. As much as possible.Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his daughter: A dream about a father hitting his daughter in a dream is considered an interpretation of what this father really wants to implement on earth to discipline her. The good desires and developments that happen to her, her disobedience and scandalous actions, and his willingness to correct her behavior. Dreaming about a father hitting his daughter with a piece of wood is evidence of the academic and scientific excellence she obtains, which helps her achieve her ambitions. He wants to control her, but he must give her a degree of freedom and self-confidence so that she does not lose it, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his daughter in Ibn Sirin. A dream about a father hitting his daughter in Ibn Sirin, if it is in his hand, shows the benefits that the girl gets from her father and the positive transformations that occur In her life, it can also symbolize the estrangement between father and daughter. . And her lack of self-control, so she needs to confront this abnormal situation and start getting closer and giving her more love and attention. A father’s dream of beating his daughter in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is a sign of his love and fear for her, and it could also be a sign, if it is with a stick, that he has broken many promises. Of the promises he had. This has already happened, and this may lead to the dissatisfaction and rejection of many of the actions that God knows best within this father. Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his unmarried daughter. A dream about a father hitting his unmarried daughter indicates closeness and understanding between them, but if the beating is on her face, This is evidence of the progress of those who are associated with it with prestige and justice, while they are ignorant. From this to the future. The dream of a father hitting his unmarried daughter if the shoe is an indication of the anger that he carries inside him regarding the dishonorable acts that he commits and that are not subject to his approval. A warning bell to stop what she is doing, which brings evil and harm to her, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of a dead father beating his unmarried daughter. A dream of a deceased father beating his unmarried daughter is a sign of the profits he makes from one of her relatives. He aspires to have ambitions and goals and can serve as a warning bell for the sins he commits, so you must repent before it is too late. Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his married daughter. A dream about a father hitting his married daughter symbolizes instability and constant disagreement with her partner because of what he does and gifts. And blessings. The dream of a father hitting his married daughter with a wooden stick is a sign of deception and hypocrisy surrounding her, but if it was by hand, it is a sign of the material and moral support that her father provides to her at this crucial stage. Her life is dominated by hardship and lack of status, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a father hitting his pregnant daughter. A dream about a father hitting his pregnant daughter indicates the suffering and pain that this woman suffers during pregnancy, so she must ask God to save her and the child.

If the dreamer sees the Messenger happy, it may express kindness and sustenance, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees the Messenger in a dream, it is evidence of goodness and justice, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger sad in a dream. In the event that a married man sees The Messenger is sad, he can express his warning against evil deeds, and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of the dream of eating with the Messenger in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of eating with the Messenger in a dream may indicate an order to pay zakat, and God Almighty knows best. But if the dreamer sees himself eating with the Messenger, he has an order to give charity, and God Almighty Knowing. Seeing a married woman eating with the Messenger may also represent paying zakat and charity, and God knows best. Seeing a single young man eating with the Messenger may indicate his command to pay zakat and zakat, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a free woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car: Seeing a car being driven in a dream for a girl

preview.html: The meaning of driving and driving a car for a girl, for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman, whether white, black, new, or old red. I dreamed that I was driving a car and I did not know how to drive a car by Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car by Ibn Sirin. If a person dreams that he is driving a car, this dream indicates On illness or loss. Whoever sees himself falling out of the car will hear unpleasant news. Whoever sees in his dream the broken car that he is riding, if he is at the beginning of a new business or project, he will not succeed in it. Whoever sees in a dream that he bought the car, his vision indicates that he will rise in honor and status. He establishes himself in his position if he is a manager, and he sees in a dream that you are selling the car, so do not keep it. Your position in your job or a change in opinions and attitudes towards an important and big issue. Whoever sees in a dream that the car he is traveling in is broken down, and if he is happy and cheerful, then he is sad and troubled, and if he succeeds in an interest, then it stops and his interests begin to diminish. She will lose. Whoever dreams that he is escaping from a car accident or from the madness of his driver, the dream indicates that he is in danger if he enters a race. Whoever sees in her dream that she is looking for a car, she will fail to tempt someone to her desire and person. Whoever sees a car in his dream indicates travel. And change. If she dreams that she is riding in a car, then she is traveling with a different company than the one she thought she had arranged to go out with. Whoever sees in a dream that she has lost the car, she will achieve her advantage. Whoever sees vehicles in his dream, there are people who are trying to harass you, annoy you, and prevent you from succeeding. Whoever sees that he is driving a car begins to... Competition, provocation and envy, which may disturb his happiness. Whoever sees that he is driving a car and stops on the side of the road and sees cars passing by, he is again trying to complete a project, plan or goal that may lead to danger as a result. If he sees himself driving a car on high and high roads, this means difficulties, but if If it is flat, it is the opposite of achieving goals, plans, and desires. It is said: Whoever sees himself driving a car, this dream will bring goodness, livelihood, and comfort. If the car is driving a woman in a dream with people and it breaks down or loses her brakes, then this may be her death at their hands or their loss; Because our Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: {A nation will not succeed if a woman handles its affairs. Since the car in reality is a means of transportation, in a dream it may symbolize travel, travelers, moving from one place to another, or a new situation that could be a new job or Marriage or other things. The negativity or positivity of the new situation that you will move into is determined by your feelings at the same time as the events of the dream. Interpreters derive the word biography from the car, and the car in the dream symbolizes the dreamer’s biography. The car in the dream symbolizes life, as its slow movement symbolizes the development of some accidents Which slowly worries you. If you dream that you are driving a car, this means that you will assume a leadership position in your business or home. If you see yourself driving a car in a dream, this also symbolizes that you are setting an example for your environment in your family or business. Driving Women and Girls

title: Interpretation of crying in a dream for a single woman 2022

preview.html: Interpretation of crying in a dream for single people 2022 Crying is one of the means by which a person expresses his sadness, pain, and harsh situations that fill his soul with sadness and depression. He cries to express what is inside him with tears. Some people see themselves crying in a dream, and commentators have interpreted this with more than one interpretation. Crying loudly in a dream for an unmarried woman. The interpretation and interpretation of the dream varies according to the social status of the individual, whether he is single, married, divorced, or widowed, and in the case of an unmarried girl. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a single girl who has not been married before crying a lot is a sign of difficulty and exhaustion soon. Crying over the dead in a dream for an unmarried woman: If a girl sees in a dream that she is at a funeral and begins to cry loudly and heartily. This is a great indication that he will feel comfortable, happy, and satisfied very soon. Crying in a dream while screaming in single women. As for seeing crying and tears in a dream, it is accompanied by screaming screams and crying with a noticeable loud sound. This indicates that the person with the insight is subjected to severe psychological and nervous pressure. Crying in a dream without shouting at single people on the other side; Leading dream interpretation scholars have stated that seeing an unmarried girl causes many tears in her dream, without this crying being accompanied by screaming or a loud sound. This indicates that her vagina is very close and she will enjoy it very soon, she will feel comfortable psychologically and physically and she will find a way out of the problem that is bothering and causing her. Psychological pressure. Crying in a dream over a dead person. As for crying in a dream with tears over a dead person, this person is also dead in reality. This is evidence that this person will be blessed in Paradise and that his actions are just. Interpretation of tears of blood in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is crying blood, this is evidence of her remorse for a sin or a great sin she has committed, and an indication that she is asking for sincere repentance and complete distancing herself from sin. Sins, disobedience and disobedience. . This angers the Almighty Creator. I dream that I cry when I hear the Qur’an about an unmarried woman. However, if a girl sees that she is listening to the Holy Qur’an and cries while listening, then it is not permissible. This is sure evidence that that girl is trying hard to get closer to her Lord and that she has a pure and strong soul, but if she is seen crying with screams and dissatisfaction with a slap in the face, then this is evidence of distress. Oppression and persecution. Crying in a dream over a living person. If an unmarried girl sees that she is crying in a dream for a living person in reality, but he died in the dream, this indicates that this person will die in reality as she saw him in the dream, and therefore if this person dies by drowning in the dream, he will die. From drowning in reality, and if he dies from illness in the dream. In reality, he will also die from illness, etc. Crying and then laughing in a single person’s dream. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is crying a lot and then laughing, then she is crying. This indicates that her death is imminent. Crying and sadness in a dream are interpreted with different interpretations. We find some of these auspicious and others troubling. Each dream has its interpretation depending on

title: Interpretation of a dream about a sheep

preview.html: Seeing a lamb in a dream is one of the visions that carry many interpretations. It can indicate goodness and food. There is another interpretation that seeing a lamb in a dream means bad and many problems. Here is the interpretation of seeing a lamb in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of seeing a lamb in a dream. Seeing a lamb in a dream While it is inside the house, it indicates the benefit that accrues to the owner of the house. Seeing a sheep indicates some problems between parents regarding inheritance. The symbol of a sheep in a dream indicates money, kindness, and blessings for the pioneer. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a sheep in a dream indicates for an unmarried woman To her imminent marriage. If an unmarried girl sees a slaughtered sheep in her dream, this means that she will receive many good things or wishes will come true. Seeing a white sheep in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that all difficulties will be completely eliminated. Seeing a black sheep in The dream means that she is a beautiful and pure girl or that she is about to get married. Seeing a sheep in general in a dream for an unmarried woman is close to hearing the news that she is waiting to hear. If an unmarried girl sees that someone is giving her a sheep as a gift, this indicates her marriage to a good young man. Interpretation Seeing a sheep in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams of a white sheep in the house, this means that her husband will give her a gift. Seeing a sheep in a dream for a married woman indicates her imminent pregnancy. As for a married woman seeing a sheep at home, this indicates that she is pregnant. If she sees that A dead person gives her a sheep, this indicates his need for her charity. If she sees that one of her relatives gives her a sheep, this indicates blessing and food. Seeing a married sheep in a dream indicates kindness. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for a man: Seeing a sheep in a dream for a man heralds goodness in work. Seeing a sheep running in a man’s dream is evidence that there is good that will perish from his hand. Seeing a sheep in a man’s dream indicates the dreamer’s kindness and blessings. As for seeing a white sheep in a dream, this indicates a lot of money. However, if he sees a black sheep in his dream, this indicates that he He will marry a good woman. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a sheep in a dream for a pregnant woman means sustenance and blessing in the life of the woman and her husband. If a pregnant woman sees a black sheep, this indicates that she will give birth soon. If a pregnant woman sees that someone is giving her a gift, this indicates a lot Of the good things that will come after her birth. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream of a sheep indicates the goodness and justice of this woman’s birth. Seeing a pregnant black sheep in a dream means that she will give birth to a male child. For a pregnant woman to see in a dream that her husband receives a sheep as a gift means that she will receive an allowance. Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for a young man: Seeing a small sheep in a small dream means that good news will come to him. Seeing a sheep in a dream, that is, a young man, means the fulfillment of all desires. Seeing a small sheep being slaughtered in a dream means kindness and money from work. If a young man dreams that he will slaughter a sheep This indicates that he will perform Hajj or...

title: A passport in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream for a single girl. She dreamed of seeing a single girl’s passport in a dream and saw that she was preparing her travel bag and was happy. This vision is considered good because it shows that she will get rid of all her problems, overcome anxiety and sadness, and begin a new stage in her life. As for seeing the passport Cut and torn in a dream for an unmarried girl, and she tried to repair it but failed in the dream. This dream symbolizes that she will suffer from her misfortune in her life, but she will be able to overcome it, God willing. In the event that a single girl sees the person she loves holding her passport, then she She smiles in a dream. Here the vision is a good omen that the dreamer will marry whomever he wants, and God knows best. And seeing a passport in the hand of a handsome young man whom she does not know, but she was happy in the dream. The dream indicates marriage to a suitable man in the near future, and God knows best. And when a single girl dreams that he She has a passport and was sad in a dream. This dream indicates that she will make a decision and regret it. Or she will be forced to make a decision against it, and she is not satisfied with it, and God knows best. See also: What is the interpretation of a dream about preparing a travel bag? Interpretation of seeing a passport in A dream for a married woman: A married woman dreams that she is preparing to travel, carrying her passport, and she was happy and laughing in the dream. A sign that the fortuneteller has freed herself from what caused her sadness and anxiety. Perhaps the vision indicates that the dreamer will change her situation for the better and for the better, and God knows best. A married woman dreams that her husband asks her Bringing her passport so that they can travel abroad for fun in a dream. The best sign of the stability of marital life, and the end of all disputes between them, and God knows best. Seeing a passport in the dream of a married woman who is satisfied with it in a dream. Good news for receiving a lot of nourishment on her way, and God knows best. As for the appearance of a torn passport in a dream for a married woman, it is a bad indication of a major crisis that the dreamer is going through alone, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream about a man and its meaningWhen a man dreams that his passport is lost and he searches for it but does not find it in the dream. This dream indicates that the dreamer will face... A major crisis in his life will cause him sadness. He needs to approach God Almighty to get him out of this, and God knows best. Seeing a man getting a passport in a dream and being happy to leave the country is a sign of getting rid of the worries and sadness that he suffered from for a long time. Perhaps its meaning is that the dreamer’s condition It will change for the better and for the better, and God knows best. Seeing a large number of passports in a man’s dream and he was keeping them and keeping them. A metaphor for many good things that the viewer enjoys in his personal and professional life. But when he saw the passport torn in the fortuneteller’s dream and it was in the hand of his wife. This The vision symbolizes the emergence of a major quarrel between the husband and his wife, but she succeeds in resolving it, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a trip in a dream for a single woman. The meaning of seeing a passport in a dream for a pregnant woman and its interpretation. A pregnant woman dreams that she is looking for a passport in a dream and does not find it. This dream indicates that The dreamer will face a big problem

title: Interpretation of extinguishing a fire in a dream and the appearance of fire in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of extinguishing the fire for an unmarried woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman for a divorced woman, whether the fire is lit in the house or in the kitchen, according to Imam Al-Sadiq Al-Nabulsi Ibn. Sirin Interpretation of extinguishing a fire in a dream by Ibn Sirini It is said in a dream that a fire is extinguished in a dream that whoever sees his fire in a furnace or oven or the like extinguished by wind, water or rain, then it is a harbinger of poverty and stopping work. And whoever among the rulers sees that a fire has been kindled in At that time, he stopped his hand, and whoever sees that the fire has been extinguished, then it is the extinguishing of strife in that place. As for whoever dreams of the fire going out that illuminates the people of his household, this is the death of the guardian. And whoever sees that the fire in his house is extinguished, and the wind enters and is kindled again, he will enter it. Thieves, and the fire in the garden goes out, the death of the owner of the garden, or the death of his family. Whoever dreams that he lights a fire and then the wind or rain extinguishes it, this indicates that fate does not agree with his desires, so he should not resist fate because he will lose. Whoever dreams that every time a fire is lit, it goes out, let him see his intentions and thoughts. Whoever dreams of extinguishing a large fire in a dream will lead to trial. If he is able to extinguish it, then he is a man of destiny before his Lord. As for whoever dreams that he cannot light a fire for warmth or food, then he is oppressed, and his supplication is accepted, God willing, because the supplication of the oppressed is not rejected. Extinguishing a fire in a dream indicates the end of sorrows and illnesses. If you see in your dream that you are standing By extinguishing a fire, this means that you will deal with the matter with a great deal of intelligence and intelligence. Whoever extinguishes a fire in a dream extinguishes strife, or invalidates an innovation. Perhaps this indicates that evil is stirred up by ashes and flying smoke. Extinguishing a bright fire in a country means the death of its leader, and in a home it means the death of its value. Ash is a difference in three aspects. He, the Most High, is like the ashes that the wind blows away on a stormy day. It was said that a dream about lighting a fire harms those who depend on it. And if the dreamer travels on the sea, he will drown and float on the surface of the water. And if he has a traveler who comes to him or hears news of it. Fire in a dream is good, good news, wealth, and glory for the one who sees it burning in his house. If He saw it in another house, this is a sign of the loss of a friend. Whoever sees a burning fire and forgets it in his loneliness. Whoever sees a burning fire and a group around it will receive goodness and blessings. If the vision of the fire is during the day, this indicates war and turmoil. If it has a tongue or tongues of flame and a voice, and if it does not have any of this, then it appears. Things: Everyone who is struck by fire in a dream and burns him, the leaders will hit him, and if you do not burn it, it will be a great fortune. And whoever sees a flame of fire at the door of his house without smoke, it indicates Hajj. If the flame is inside the house, it is a wedding. Dreaming of a raging fire is a symbol of adversity and strife. Firefighters or firefighters in a dream are happy news. Interpretation Fire in a dream A fire in a dream is often a harbinger of disaster, and in general what burns his body, clothing, or possessions in the fire, these are misfortunes and fears, as Ibn Sirin explained. Evil befalls the priest as long as the fire burns his organs or clothes, and if the fire that burned him has a tongue or flame, then it befalls him. A calamity comes from the Sultan, or something bad befalls him. For war or for the people who love him, and if not for fire
preview.text: The meaning of extinguishing the fire for an unmarried woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman for a divorced woman, whether the fire is lit in the house or in the kitchen, according to Imam Al-Sadiq Al-Nabulsi Ibn. Sirin Interpretation of extinguishing a fire in a dream by Ibn Sirini It is said in a dream that a fire is extinguished in a dream that whoever sees his fire in a furnace or oven or the like extinguished by wind, water or rain, then it is a harbinger of poverty and stopping work. And whoever among the rulers sees that a fire has been kindled in At that time, he stopped his hand, and whoever sees that the fire has been extinguished, then it is the extinguishing of strife in that place. As for whoever dreams of the fire going out that illuminates the people of his household, this is the death of the guardian. And whoever sees that the fire in his house is extinguished, and the wind enters and is kindled again, he will enter it. Thieves, and the fire in the garden goes out, the death of the owner of the garden, or the death of his family. Whoever dreams that he lights a fire and then the wind or rain extinguishes it, this indicates that fate does not agree with his desires, so he should not resist fate because he will lose. Whoever dreams that every time a fire is lit, it goes out, let him see his intentions and thoughts. Whoever dreams of extinguishing a large fire in a dream will lead to trial. If he is able to extinguish it, then he is a man of destiny before his Lord. As for whoever dreams that he cannot light a fire for warmth or food, then he is oppressed, and his supplication is accepted, God willing, because the supplication of the oppressed is not rejected. Extinguishing a fire in a dream indicates the end of sorrows and illnesses. If you see in your dream that you are standing By extinguishing a fire, this means that you will deal with the matter with a great deal of intelligence and intelligence. Whoever extinguishes a fire in a dream extinguishes strife, or invalidates an innovation. Perhaps this indicates that evil is stirred up by ashes and flying smoke. Extinguishing a bright fire in a country means the death of its leader, and in a home it means the death of its value. Ash is a difference in three aspects. He, the Most High, is like the ashes that the wind blows away on a stormy day. It was said that a dream about lighting a fire harms those who depend on it. And if the dreamer travels on the sea, he will drown and float on the surface of the water. And if he has a traveler who comes to him or hears news of it. Fire in a dream is good, good news, wealth, and glory for the one who sees it burning in his house. If He saw it in another house, this is a sign of the loss of a friend. Whoever sees a burning fire and forgets it in his loneliness. Whoever sees a burning fire and a group around it will receive goodness and blessings. If the vision of the fire is during the day, this indicates war and turmoil. If it has a tongue or tongues of flame and a voice, and if it does not have any of this, then it appears. Things: Everyone who is struck by fire in a dream and burns him, the leaders will hit him, and if you do not burn it, it will be a great fortune. And whoever sees a flame of fire at the door of his house without smoke, it indicates Hajj. If the flame is inside the house, it is a wedding. Dreaming of a raging fire is a symbol of adversity and strife. Firefighters or firefighters in a dream are happy news. Interpretation Fire in a dream A fire in a dream is often a harbinger of disaster, and in general what burns his body, clothing, or possessions in the fire, these are misfortunes and fears, as Ibn Sirin explained. Evil befalls the priest as long as the fire burns his organs or clothes, and if the fire that burned him has a tongue or flame, then it befalls him. A calamity comes from the Sultan, or something bad befalls him. For war or for the people who love him, and if not for fire
